tool_description:
Nurse verification is used to verify whether an individual is a registered nurse with the Indian Nurse Council (INC).

Use GET Call API to fetch results, using the request_id received in response.
title: Nurse Verification

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: Nurse Verification
api_list.description: Nurse verification is used to verify whether an individual is a registered nurse with the Indian Nurse Council (INC).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nurse-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_nurse"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nurse-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nurse-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_nurse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
